General.Name: Bonpay
General.Description: Bonpay is a full-fledged Blockchain service, including a wide range of solutions, from Bitcoin storage to plastic or virtual card. BON is an Ethereum-based token that provides token holders with incentive rewards and cashback bonuses.

ICO.Description:
Bonpay is a full-fledged Blockchain service, including a wide range of solutions, from Bitcoin storage to plastic or virtual card. BON is an Ethereum-based token that provides token holders with incentive rewards and cashback bonuses.

Team:

  • Alex Blazhevych: CEO 
  • Oleg Boykov: CTO 
  • Valentin Kaduchenko: CPO 
  • Julya Bashtannik: CFO

The Bonpay ICO will start on the 31st of October and will last until the 28th of November. The ICO allocation represents 51% of the total supply. BON tokens will be available for a 0.002 ETH starting price. The ICO funding cap/target is 200000 ETH.

Token Reserve Split:

  • 51% for public ICO
  • 34% for business development,
  • 15% for early investors, founders, employees

The Bonpay ICO will feature a bonus and bounty campaign as well as an escrow agent.

Bonus Structure:

  • 24h - 20%
  • first 2-3 days - 15%
  • day 4-7 - 10%
  • second week - 5%
